caption.title: siRNA identifies cell type specificity of genes that modulate replication of EV71 and HAV.
caption.p: Vero / HEp2-c cells were reverse transfected with non-targeting control (NTC) / gene specific on-target plus (OTP) siRNAs (50nM) for48h followed by infection with EV71 (A and B) or Hepatitis A virus (HAV) (C and D). Effect of gene knockdown on viral replication is shown as fold -change relative to NTC from pooled samples. Error bars represent Â±SEM from two independent experiments. * p<0.05 **p<0.01 ***p<0.001 ****p<0.0001.
